CustomField.formula: "Summit Matching Rule 1: " + BR()+ " * First 3 chars of First Name/Pref first name, Last Name, Birthdate => Last Name, Email;" + BR()+ " - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -" + BR()+ BR()+ "Summit Matching Rule 2: " + BR()+ " * Last Name/Previous last name, Class year, First name, Phone => Last Name, Class Year, First 3 chars of First name" + BR()+ " - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -" + BR()+ BR()+ "Salesforce Duplicate Rule: " + BR()+ " * Custom Matching Rule that allows organizations to create their own matching logic using a Salesforce Duplicate Rule"
CustomField.label: Contact Matching Rule Description
